name: Bearium
description: What is the project about? Bearium is a tokenized 'shares' for Bearproof.io, advanced automated trading platform (Trading Robot) that leverages Money Management and Technical Analysis as the core of the platform. What makes your project unique? Bearium has solid & running MVP (Bearproof). 50% of net revenue from Bearproof will be used for buyback and burn Bearium until the total supply reduce to 100M. It means the value of Bearium will be increased over the time History of your project. First,we created Bearproof last year and we have several user. We have good feedback from our user and partnership as a broker with Binance and Gateio. Last month we have an idea to make an "IPO" but use a token as Bearproof's share Whatâ€™s next for your project? We have completed launchpad round 1 for Bearproof and it reached the hardcap. Next we will have launchpad round 2 on 17th May and launch 24th May. for the roadmap you can check at https://bearium.bearproof.io/#roadmap What can your token be used for? Initialy we will onboard Bearium as currency on Bearproof to pay subscription or sharing profit (gas) fee
